info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 8:58PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Madison and southeastern Beaverhead Counties through 945 PM MDT... At 858 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles southeast of Divide to 12 miles southeast of Dillon to 18 miles east of Gilmore. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dillon, Sheridan, Virginia City, Ennis, Twin Bridges, Lima, Alder, Monida, Norris, Dell, Bannack Pass, Mcallister, Laurin, Cameron, Snowline, Glen and Jeffers. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
